posts.post_content:
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10337/beckley[/IMG]

Brilliant colors

Fine registration

Above average centering

Just a bit of Pixie Dust on the reverse.

Listen to Peter Pan

“All you need is a little faith, trust, and pixie dust.”

and add this Jake to your collection today for $133 shipped net.

So here’s the deal.

You’re the buyer.

You deserve a premium, not me.

A premium will be added to your package in the form of cash.

The amount added will never decrease.

It will increase, not daily, but it will increase

All you need is faith, trust and, of course, pixie dust.

The initial premium added will be a $10 bill and it will be added today.

To find out the total premium added at any time, you must buy the card.;)
Card is still available in a new listing for a ridiculously lower price.
